EmailTemplate.name: Campaign_Rubbermaid Carts_Hilton Program Header_KD
EmailTemplate.subject: Special Offer - Commercial Grade Rubbermaid Carts, {!Account.Cust_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
I am following up on my voice mail regarding special pricing on select Rubbermaid Cart(s). These carts are designed to provide solutions around housekeeping and other functions that are important to your location. Please let me know when it is a good time for me to call you.
Rubbermaid Commercial Products - Cart Models On-Sale:
Item# 1633825 RCP# FG618900BLA - Rubbermaid® Commercial Executive Full-Size Housekeeping Cart, 50"H x 22"W x 60"D, Black Item# 743894 RCP# 1881749 - Rubbermaid® Collapsible X-Cart, 4-Bushel, 24"H x 20 5/16"W x 24 1/8"D, Black Item# 743963 RCP# 1881750 - Rubbermaid® Collapsible X-Cart, 8-Bushel, 34 5/8"H x 24 1/8"W x 35 3/4"D, Black Item# 431922 RCP# 19022465 Large - Rubbermaid® Executive Quick Cart, Large, Dark Gray Item# 431944 RCP# 190266 Medium - Rubbermaid® Executive Quick Cart, Medium, Dark Gray Item# 431949 RCP# 1902467 Small Rubbermaid® Executive Quick Cart, Small, Dark Gray Item# 361690 RCP# FG617388BLA Rubbermaid® Janitor Cart With Zipper Vinyl Bag Item# 913878 RCP# FG450088BLA Rubbermaid Commercial HD 2-Shelf Utility Cart with Lipped Shelf (Small) - 2 Shelf - 500 lb Capacity - 4 Casters - 5" Caster Size - Resin - 39" Length x 17.9" Width x 33.2" Height - Black
Shop Rubbermaid https://business.officedepot.com/catalog/search.do?Ntt=RUBBERMAID
Office Depot Business Resources:
Customer Service - 1-888-777-4044 - placing orders, troubleshooting orders, tracking orders, address shipping issues and request returns. Office Depot Billing Department 800-721-6592 press opt 2 Email: abbillingsupport@officedepot.com Invoice Requests: inv-pods@officedepot.com E-Commerce: (Logins, website support): 1-800-269-6888 Email: ecsupport@officedepot.com
We appreciate your business!
Sincerely,
Karen Daniel
Inside Sales, Business Account Manager | Office Depot, Inc. Tel: 1-855-337-6811 Ext 12842 | karen.daniel@officedepot.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
